name: Goofy's Hysterical History Tour
overview: Poor Goofy! His arch-rival - that nasty Pete - is out to get him again! This time he's trying to get Goofy fired from his janitor's job at the Ludwig von Drake History Museum by sabotaging the exhibits! But not to worry! Goofy's latest invention, the trusty Extend-O-Hand, is more than up to the task of keeping Pete and his mean minions at bay while Goofy blunders his way through time on a quest for misplaced museum pieces! From Prehistoric and Medieval days to Colonial America and the Wild West, Goofy's first Sega Genesis adventure is the most hysterical history tour there ever was! Can our daydreaming hero save the museum exhibits, history as we know it, and his job all in the same night? He'll need your help to do it!
